```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())

library(boot)
library(broom)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(tidy = FALSE,
                      fig.width = 6,
                      fig.height = 5)

```

```{r read}
dados = read_csv(here::here("data/satisfacoes.csv"), 
                 col_types = "cdcc") 

glimpse(dados)
```


```{r}
df = tibble(names = character(), statistic = double(), low = double(), high = double())
df = df %>% add_row(names = "baseline - combined", statistic = 1.913043	, low = 1.59956, high = 2.251426)
df = df %>% add_row(names = "baseline - skip", statistic = 0.3913043, low = 0.04759741, high = 0.7165453)
df = df %>% add_row(names = "baseline - like/dislike", statistic = 1.521739, low = 1.179048, high = 1.876336)
df = df %>% add_row(names = "baseline - up/downvoting", statistic = 2.26087, low = 1.961678, high = 2.602931)
df
```


```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(names, statistic)) + 
    geom_point() +
    geom_errorbar(aes(y = statistic, ymin = low, ymax = high), width=0.2) +
    coord_flip()
```
